data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roca-Cusachs, Marcos, Jung, Sunghoon (2019): Redefining Stagonomus Gorski based on morphological and molecular data (Pentatomidae: Eysarcorini). Zootaxa 4658 (2): 368-374, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4658.2.10
